meanings.meaning_en_US: To strike or touch with the foot.

examples.sentence: He decided to [kick] the ball.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他決定去[踢]球。

examples.sentence: She [kicked] the door open.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她[踢]開了門。

examples.sentence: They will [kick] off the event at noon.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們將在中午[踢]開始這個活動。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Two times; on two occasions.

examples.sentence: I have visited that museum [twice].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我去過那個博物館兩次。

examples.sentence: He called me [twice] yesterday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他昨天給我打了兩次電話。

examples.sentence: She has seen that movie [twice].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她已經看過那部電影兩次。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A large vessel for transporting people or goods by sea.

examples.sentence: The [ship] sailed across the ocean.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 船在海洋上航行。

examples.sentence: They loaded the cargo onto the [ship].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們將貨物裝載到船上。

examples.sentence: The cruise [ship] is very luxurious.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這艘郵輪非常豪華。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To send goods or people to a destination.

examples.sentence: We will [ship] your order tomorrow.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們明天會運送你的訂單。

examples.sentence: They [shipped] the products internationally.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們將產品運送到國外。

examples.sentence: Please [ship] the package carefully.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請小心運送包裹。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having a small width in proportion to the height or length.

examples.sentence: She has a very [slim] figure.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的身材非常苗條

examples.sentence: He prefers [slim] laptops that are easy to carry.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他喜歡容易攜帶的苗條筆記型電腦

examples.sentence: The [slim] design of the phone makes it attractive.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這款手機的苗條設計使其更加吸引人

meanings.meaning_en_US: One of the five digits on the hand.

examples.sentence: He pointed with his index [finger].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他用食指指著。

examples.sentence: She injured her [finger] while cooking.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在做飯時傷到了手指。

examples.sentence: You should wash your [fingers] before eating.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你在吃飯前應該洗手指。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A soft, sticky mixture of soil and water.

examples.sentence: The pig rolled in the [mud].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 豬在泥巴裡打滾。

examples.sentence: After the rain, the path was covered in [mud].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 雨後，小路上覆蓋著泥巴。

examples.sentence: Children love to play with [mud].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 孩子們喜歡玩泥巴。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To make a choice or come to a resolution.

examples.sentence: I need to [decide] what to wear.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我需要決定穿什麼

examples.sentence: They couldn't [decide] on a restaurant.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們無法決定去哪家餐廳

examples.sentence: She will [decide] by tomorrow.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她將在明天做出決定

meanings.meaning_en_US: An abbreviation for Post Meridian, used to denote the hours after noon.

examples.sentence: The meeting is scheduled for 3 [pm].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 會議安排在下午三點。

examples.sentence: Please arrive by 5 [pm] for dinner.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請在下午五點前到達吃晚餐。

examples.sentence: They usually start work at 1 [pm].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們通常在下午一點開始工作。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having a lot of money or valuable possessions.

examples.sentence: He became [rich] after his successful business venture.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在成功的商業冒險後變得富有

examples.sentence: The [rich] man donated a lot to charity.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那位富有的人捐了很多錢給慈善機構

examples.sentence: She lives in a [rich] neighborhood with luxurious homes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她住在一個富裕的社區，裡面有豪華的房子

meanings.meaning_en_US: The length of time that a person has lived or a thing has existed.

examples.sentence: What is your [age]?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你多大年齡？

examples.sentence: The building is over a hundred years old; its [age] is impressive.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這座建築物已有一百多年；它的年齡令人印象深刻。

examples.sentence: He acts younger than his [age].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的行為比他的年齡看起來要年輕。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The period of time at the end of the day, usually from 5 PM to bedtime.

examples.sentence: We often go for walks in the [evening].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們經常在傍晚散步

examples.sentence: The [evening] sky was filled with stars.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 傍晚的天空布滿了星星

examples.sentence: She loves to relax in the [evening] with a book.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡在傍晚時分讀書放鬆

meanings.meaning_en_US: A room for sleeping in.

examples.sentence: She decorated her [bedroom] with beautiful paintings.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她為自己的臥室裝飾了漂亮的畫作

examples.sentence: The [bedroom] was painted a calming shade of blue.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 臥室被漆成了一種令人放鬆的藍色

examples.sentence: He keeps his [bedroom] very tidy and organized.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他保持臥室非常整潔有序

meanings.meaning_en_US: A visible impression or trace on a surface.

examples.sentence: Please put a [mark] next to your answer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請在你的答案旁邊做標記。

examples.sentence: He has a distinctive [mark] on his arm.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他手臂上有個顯著的標記。

examples.sentence: The teacher gave her a high [mark] for her project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 老師給了她的項目高分。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A sound, especially one that is loud or unpleasant.

examples.sentence: The construction outside made a lot of [noise].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 外面的施工產生了很多噪音。

examples.sentence: I can't concentrate because of the [noise] from the TV.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我無法集中精神，因為電視的噪音。

examples.sentence: She complained about the [noise] in the restaurant.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她抱怨餐廳裡的噪音。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A building or group of buildings where goods are manufactured.

examples.sentence: The [factory] produces cars.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這家工廠生產汽車。

examples.sentence: He works in a textile [factory].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在一家纺织工厂工作。

examples.sentence: The old [factory] is being renovated.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這家舊工廠正在進行翻修。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A garment for the upper body, typically with a collar and sleeves.

examples.sentence: I wore a blue [shirt] to the party.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我穿了一件藍衬衫去派對。

examples.sentence: He bought a new [shirt] for work.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他為工作買了一件新襯衫。

examples.sentence: My favorite [shirt] is the one with stripes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我最喜歡的襯衫是有條紋的那一件。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To remain in the same place or position.

examples.sentence: Please [stay] here until I return.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請在這裡等我回來。

examples.sentence: They decided to [stay] for the party.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們決定留在派對上。

examples.sentence: You can [stay] with us if you like.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如果你願意，可以和我們住在一起。

meanings.meaning_en_US: At certain times; occasionally.

examples.sentence: I go for a walk [sometimes] when the weather is nice.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我有時候在天氣好的時候去散步。

examples.sentence: He [sometimes] forgets to turn off the lights.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他有時候忘記關燈。

examples.sentence: They visit us [sometimes], usually on weekends.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們有時候會來看我們，通常在週末。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A beverage made by infusing the dried crushed leaves of the tea plant in boiling water.

examples.sentence: She enjoys a cup of [tea] every morning.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她每天早上都喜歡喝一杯茶

examples.sentence: The [tea] ceremony is an important tradition.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 茶道是一個重要的傳統

examples.sentence: He prefers green [tea] over black.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他喜歡綠茶而不是紅茶
